game_description: Are you Free? A media owned by you AfreecaTV! AfreecaTV connects to the next world through VR platform. Enjoy VR-only content including 3D games, interactive content and 3D 180-degree videos. You can also explore any video on AfreecaTV, from live broadcasts to VOD, in virtual space. Meet your favorite streamer in virtual reality! VR Game - Duet Karaoke: Practice your vocals and make your one and only duet song in VR karaoke. - Catch Stars Game: Receive all the stars flying in during the time limit! Interactive & Immersive Content - Experience virtual dating from a first-person point of view - Learn English and Chinese conversation in a situational play - Immerse yourself in realistic 3D 180-degree video Live broadcast & VOD - View multiple content simultaneously on multiple screens - Communicate freely with streamers and users through live chat and emoticons
Languages: English, Chinese (China), Japanese, Korean, Thai, Vietnamese
review_1: Map.kakao.com 🗺️and map.naver.com 🌍 for K-pop 🎶tour and language😽learning, Samsung🚝and LG phone📱,KIA🚗and snow❄️skining,the BJ using KoreaTelcom/LGU+or South Korea telecom ISP ☎️?
review_2: I thought it was just for 180 videos, but there are a lot of mini games(3d/interactive). My favorite is VR karaoke. I can sing k-pop songs with AfreecaTV's popular singer in virtual space like sutidos and concert hall. I wish there were more songs.
review_3: AfreecaTV is the most famous Internet broadcasting platform in Korea. All the good K contents are provided in the VR environment. e-Sports such as PUBG and GSL can be viewed on a big or multi-screen.
review_4: It won’t open or load the page?
review_5: I think I used to restream to afreeca. I might have also gotten my name into the image of the afreeca app. Let me check. Yeah. I did.
